messages.subject: RE: [Unschooling-Discussion] Kelly Lovejoy, getting someone new into conf.?
messages.msgSnippet: kbcdlovejo@aol.com Shannon Buckley Mom to Connor 3-15-97, Carsten born at home 4-27-99/5-19-00 and Quinn born at home 8-08-02 ... From: glad2bmadly
messages.messageBody:
kbcdlovejo@...

Shannon Buckley
Mom to Connor 3-15-97, Carsten born at home 4-27-99/5-19-00 and Quinn born
at home 8-08-02

-----Original Message-----
From: glad2bmadly [mailto:glad2bmadly@...]
Sent: Monday, August 18, 2003 10:22 AM
To: unschooling-Discussion@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [Unschooling-Discussion] Kelly Lovejoy, getting someone new into
conf.?

I have a good friend who is coming to Columbia, from N.C. while we are
there to see Shannon Buckley and I. She will only arrive on Sat. and will
spend Sat. night at the hotel if she can get a room or somewhere else
nearby. She will be there with DH and kids. She is fence sitting about
hschooling in general and is toying with the idea of unschooling. Would it
be poss. for her to come to a talk or two? How would that work? I know
you're crazy busy but any info. would be greatly appreciated. She has very
little money.

Does anyone know Kelly's personal Email addy?

Madeline, (passionately recruiting unschoolers but needing them to hear the
veterans' wisdom!)





---------------------------------
Do you Yahoo!?

I have a good friend who is coming to Columbia, from N.C. while we are there to see Shannon Buckley and I. She will only arrive on Sat. and will spend Sat. night at the hotel if she can get a room or somewhere else nearby. She will be there with DH and kids. She is fence sitting about hschooling in general and is toying with the idea of unschooling. Would it be poss. for her to come to a talk or two? How would that work? I know you're crazy busy but any info. would be greatly appreciated. She has very little money.

Does anyone know Kelly's personal Email addy?

Madeline, (passionately recruiting unschoolers but needing them to hear the veterans' wisdom!)
